column1: Other bvrR regulated genes related with cell envelope were: three lipoprotein genes ( BAB1 _ 0358; BAB1 _ 0589; BAB1 _ 2147), which were down - regulated; six genes for periplasmic proteins and chaperones ( htpX, heat shock protein, BAB1 _ 1821; clpA and clpB, stress response proteins, BAB1 _ 1573 and BAB1 _ 1868, respectively; BAB2 _ 1107; BAB1 _ 0505; BAB1 _ 1022), which were all up - regulated; one gene related with LPS biosynthesis ( glycosyl transferase, BAB1 _ 1620), which was up - regulated; and five genes for fatty acids biosynthesis ( fabG, ketoacyl - acyl - carrier - protein reductase, BAB1 _ 2043; fabF, oxoacyl - acyl - carrier - protein synthase, BAB1 _ 0872; fadD, fatty - acyl - CoA synthase, BAB1 _ 0320; cfa, cyclopropane - fatty - acyl - phospholipid synthase, BAB1 _ 0476; BAB1 _ 1357).
